locale.description: This property is used to get paths relative to the current locale. It should be the name of the folder this messages.json is in.

lang_code.description: This is the language code for the lang URL parameter on the new LDS.org scriptures. The classic scriptures should use locale correctly.

app_title.description: The official title of the app, displayed all over.

app_description.message: A very lightweight, offline version of the scriptures of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints.
app_description.description: The description in the app manifest that is shown in the extensions tab and in the webstore.

ref_ldsorg.message: Click here to go the this scripture on LDS.org
ref_ldsorg.description: This message is shown as a tooltip on the button that will allow the user to switch from the app to the church website.
